title: A  Open-Label, Active-Controlled  Study of OPS-108 (bisphosphonate) in Patients With Heart Failure
officialTitle: A  Open-Label, Active-Controlled  Study of OPS-108 (bisphosphonate) in Patients With Heart Failure
description: This is a  open-label, active-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of OPS-108 (bisphosphonate) in patients with Heart Failure. The study will enroll approximately 459 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 23-81 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Heart Failure
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
